title: Bug 18028 - 'Rename Package' Does Not Check Resource Writability
description: The 'Rename Package' functionality does not verify if all resources are writeable, leading to unexpected exceptions.
OB: The observed behavior of the bug report is missing, but it is likely related to issues encountered when attempting to rename a package containing read-only files.
EB: The expected behavior is that the 'Rename Package' functionality should include a precondition check to verify if resources inside packages are writeable. This should prevent any exceptions from occurring during the renaming process.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1) Create a package containing read-only files.
2) Attempt to rename the package.
Observation: Unexpected exceptions may occur during or after the renaming process.
